text: Sheila Levine Is Dead and Living in New York is a 1975 American black comedy movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and was based on the novel of the same name by Gail Parent. It stars Roy Scheider, Jeannie Berlin, Sid Melton and Rebecca Dianna Smith and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. title: Sheila Levine Is Dead and Living in New York
